version.title: Workflow version (WFM)
version.markdownDescription: Version of the workflow. Semantic versioning pattern must be used. *Optional*.

tags.title: Workflow tags
tags.markdownDescription: List of predefined and custom tags associated with this workflow. *Optional*.

version.title: Version of the workflow.
version.markdownDescription: Version of the workflow. Semantic versioning pattern must be used. *Optional*.

dependencies.title: Workflow platform or nodal dependencies
dependencies.markdownDescription: Dependencies to particular nodal releases of NSP/NFM-P releases

input.title: Workflow input
input.markdownDescription: List defining required input parameter names and optionally their default values in a form `my_param: 123`. *Optional*.

vars.title: Workflow variables (WFM)
vars.markdownDescription: Any data structure arbitrarily containing YAQL/Jinja2 expressions that is used as additional workflow input. *Optional*.

output.title: Workflow output
output.markdownDescription: Any data structure arbitrarily containing YAQL/Jinja2 expressions that defines workflow output. May be nested. *Optional*.

output-on-error.title: Workflow error-output
output-on-error.markdownDescription: Any data structure arbitrarily containing YAQL/Jinja2 expressions that defines output of a workflow to be returned if it goes into error state. May be nested. *Optional*.

task-defaults.title: Task defaults
task-defaults.markdownDescription: Enables developers to set some task attributes default at workflow level. *Optional*. Corresponding attribute defined for a specific task always takes precedence.

tasks.title: Workflow tasks
tasks.markdownDescription: Task names must not be equal to `noop`, `fail`, `succeed` or `pause`.

task.title: Workflow task
task.markdownDescription: Defines specific computational step in the workflow. Each task can optionally take input data and produce output. Tasks can be associated with an action or a workflow.

action.title: Action
action.markdownDescription: Name of the action associated with the task. Can be a static value or an expression. *Mutually exclusive with `workflow`. If neither `action` nor `workflow` are provided, then the action `std.noop` will be used that does nothing.

workflow.title: (Sub-)Workflow
workflow.markdownDescription: Name of the workflow associated with the task. Can be a static value or an expression. *Mutually exclusive with `action`. If neither `action` nor `workflow` are provided, then the action `std.noop` will be used that does nothing.

input.title: Input
input.markdownDescription: Input parameter values of the action or sub-workflow.

publish.title: Publish
publish.markdownDescription: Variables to publish to the workflow context in case of task execution success. Any JSON-compatible data structure optionally containing expression to select precisely what needs to be published. Published variables will be accessible for downstream tasks using expressions. *Optional*.

publish-on-error.title: Publish on Error
publish-on-error.markdownDescription: Variables to publish to the workflow context in case of task execution failures. Any JSON-compatible data structure optionally containing expression to select precisely what needs to be published. Published variables will be accessible for downstream tasks using expressions. *Optional*.

with-items.title: With items
with-items.markdownDescription: Allows to run action or workflow associated with a task multiple times iterating over a provided list of items. *Optional*.

keep-result.title: Keep result
keep-result.markdownDescription: Allows to disable the storage of action results after task completion (e.g. if they are large and not needed afterwards). *Optional*. By default is `true`.

pause-before.title: Pause before
pause-before.markdownDescription: Put workflow engine on hold before starting the task. *Optional*.

wait-before.title: Wait before
wait-before.markdownDescription: Defines a delay in seconds that workflow engine should wait after the task has completed before starting next tasks defined in *on-success*, *on-error* or *on-complete*. *Optional*.

wait-after.title: Wait after
wait-after.markdownDescription: Defines a delay in seconds that workflow engine should wait before starting the task. *Optional*.

fail-on.title: Fail on
fail-on.markdownDescription: Defines a condition under which the task will fail, even if the action/workflow was completed successfully. *Optional*.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.markdownDescription: Defines a period of time in seconds after which the task/workflow will be failed automatically by engine if it hasnâ€™t completed. *Optional*.

retry.title: Retry Policy
retry.markdownDescription: Defines a pattern how task should be repeated in case of an error. *Optional*.

count.title: Count
count.markdownDescription: Defines a maximum number of times that a task can be repeated. *Optional*.

delay.title: Delay
delay.markdownDescription: Defines a delay in seconds between subsequent task iterations. *Optional*.

break-on.title: Break-on
break-on.markdownDescription: Defines an expression that will break iteration loop if it evaluates to `true`. If it fires then the task is considered error. *Optional*.

continue-on.title: Continue-on
continue-on.markdownDescription: Defines an expression that will continue iteration loop if it evaluates to `true`. If it fires then the task is considered successful. If it evaluates to `false` then policy will break the iteration. *Optional*.

safe-rerun.title: Safe to rerun
safe-rerun.markdownDescription: Allow to rerun task if executor dies during action execution. If set to `true` task may be run twice. *Optional*. By default set to `false`.

concurrency.title: Concurrency (Flow Control)
concurrency.markdownDescription: Defines a max number of actions or workflows running simultaneously in a task. Applicable only for tasks that have `with-items`. If property is not set then actions (or workflows in case of nested workflows) of the task will be scheduled for execution all at once. *Optional*.

join.title: Join (Flow Control)
join.markdownDescription: Allows to synchronize multiple parallel workflow branches and aggregate their data. *Optional*.

on-success.title: On-success (Flow Control)
on-success.markdownDescription: List of tasks which will run after the task has completed successfully. *Optional*.

on-error.title: On-error (Flow Control)
on-error.markdownDescription: List of tasks which will run after the task has completed with an error. *Optional*.

on-complete.title: On-complete (Flow Control)
on-complete.markdownDescription: List of tasks which will run after the task has completed regardless of whether it is successful or not. *Optional*.
